title: Root Slayer Shovel Pair
description: With the Award-Winning Root Slayer Shovel and Root Slayer Nomad you can attack and conquer the toughest areas in your lawn and garden. Need to dig out shrubs, bamboo, ornamental grasses or noxious weeds. Need to penetrate rocky clay, cut through tough sod or dig a trench through a thicket of roots. This pair of Root Slayers is all you need. If you've ever needed to do a lot of digging under difficult conditions, you will really appreciate the thoughtful design and power of these tools.
